articles.title: The iPhone Alarm Picker Feels Like Magic Until You Realize It Is Just a List That Stops Dead At 4:39 - Wccftech
articles.content: When you pull up the alarm on your iPhone, you are greeted by what looks like a classic spinning wheel of hours and minutes. Swiping up or down on either would give you an endless, circular dial that… [+1938 chars]

articles.content:
